greyuser: Only bouncers and up can run a bot.
bouncer: The bot can't move people when it's run as a bouncer.
songknown: :repeat: This song has been played %%PLAYS%% time(s) in the last %%TIMETOTAL%%, last play was %%LASTTIME%% ago. :repeat:
timelimit: @%%NAME%%, your song is longer than %%MAXLENGTH%% minutes.
permissionownsong: :up: @%%NAME%% has permission to play their own production!
isblacklisted: This track is on the %%BLACKLIST%% blacklist!
alreadyadding: User is already being added! Changed the desired position to %%POSITION%%.
adding: Added @%%NAME%% to the queue. Current queue: %%POSITION%%.
notdisconnected: @%%NAME%% I have not seen you disconnect.
noposition: No last position known. The waitlist needs to update at least once to register a user's last position.
toolongago: @%%NAME%%'s last disconnect was too long ago: %%TIME%%.
valid: @%%NAME%% disconnected %%TIME%% ago and should be at position %%POSITION%%.
warning1: @%%NAME%%, AFK for %%TIME%%. please remain active when in the waitlist.
roomadvertising: @%%NAME%%, don't post links to other rooms please.
adfly: @%%NAME%%, please change your autowoot program. We suggest nWOOT: https://nbot.eu/Installation.nwoot
newblacklisted: [@%%NAME%%] This track belongs on the %%BLACKLIST%% list! [ %%AUTHOR%% - %%TITLE%% - %%MID%% ]
activeusersintime: [@%%NAME%% There have been %%AMOUNT%% users chatting in the past %%TIME%% minutes.
maximumafktimeset: [@%%NAME%%] Maximum afk duration set to %%TIME%% minutes.
autowoot: We recommend nWOOT for autowooting: https://nbot.eu/Installation.nwoot
brandambassador: A Brand Ambassador is the voice of the plug.dj users. They promote events, engage the community and share the plug.dj message around the world. For more info: http://blog.plug.dj/brand-ambassadors/
bouncerplusrank: [@%%NAME%%] You have to be manager or up to enable Bouncer+.
nousercookie: /em doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and eats a cookie himself.
selfcookie: @%%NAME%%, you're a bit greedy, aren't you? Giving cookies to yourself, bah. Share some with other people!
cycleguardtime: [@%%NAME%%] The cycleguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
dclookuprank: [@%%NAME%%] Only bouncers and above can do a lookup for others.
notinwaitlist: @%%NAME%%, you are not on the waitlist.
eta: @%%NAME%% you will reach the booth in approximately %%TIME%%.
starterhelp: This image will get you started on plug: %%LINK%%
jointime: [@%%NAMEFROM%%] @%%USERNAME%% has been in the room for %%TIME%%.
kickrank: [@%%NAME%%] you can't kick users with an equal or higher rank than you!
kick: [@%%NAME%%], @%%USERNAME%% you are being kicked from the community for %%TIME%% minutes.
lockskippos: [@%%NAME%%] Lockskip will now move the dj to position %%POSITION%%.
lockguardtime: [@%%NAME%%] The lockguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
maxlengthtime: [@%%NAME%%] The maximum song duration is set to %%TIME%% minutes.
addbotwaitlist: @%%NAME%%, don't try to add me to the waitlist, please.
mutedmaxtime: [@%%NAME%%] You can only mute for maximum %%TIME%% minutes.
muterank: [@%%NAME%%] You can't mute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
removenotinwl: [@%%NAME%%] Specified user @%%USERNAME%% is not in the waitlist.
roomrules: Please find the room rules here: %%LINK%%
sessionstats: [@%%NAME%%] Total Woots: %%WOOTS%%, Total Mehs: %%MEHS%%, Total Grabs: %%GRABS%%.
swapinvalid: [@%%NAME%%] Invalid user specified. (No names with spaces!)
swapwlonly: [@%%NAME%%] Please only swap users that are in the waitlist!
genres: Please find the permissible room genres here: %%LINK%%
unmuteeveryonerank: [@%%NAME%%] Only managers and up can unmute everyone at once.
unmuterank: [@%%NAME%%] You can't unmute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
commandscd: [@%%NAME%%] The cooldown for commands by users is now set to %%TIME%% seconds.
